info.description: Response to a claim predetermination or preauthorization
info.title: FHIR R4 ClaimResponse Resource

ClaimResponse.description: Response to a claim predetermination or preauthorization

communicationRequest.description: Request for additional supporting or authorizing information.

created.description: The date this resource was created.

disposition.description: A human readable description of the status of the adjudication.

form.description: The actual form, by reference or inclusion, for printing the content or an EOB.

formCode.description: A code for the form to be used for printing the content.

identifier.description: A unique identifier assigned to this claim response.

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

insurer.description: The party responsible for authorization, adjudication and reimbursement.

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

outcome.description: The outcome of the claim, predetermination, or preauthorization processing.

patient.description: The recipient of the products and services

payeeType.description: Type of Party to be reimbursed: subscriber, provider, other.

preAuthPeriod.description: The time frame during which this authorization is effective.

preAuthRef.description: Reference from the Insurer which is used in later communications which refers to this adjudication.

requestor.description: The provider which is responsible for the claim, predetermination or preauthorization.

status.description: The status of the resource instance.

text.description: Text summary of the resource, for human interpretation

location[x].description: Place of service or where product was supplied

productOrService.description: Billing, service, product, or drug code

programCode.description: Program the product or service is provided under

serviced[x].description: Date or dates of service or product delivery

unitPrice.description: Fee, charge or cost per item

productOrService.description: Billing, service, product, or drug code

unitPrice.description: Fee, charge or cost per item

productOrService.description: Billing, service, product, or drug code

unitPrice.description: Fee, charge or cost per item

focal.description: Coverage to be used for adjudication

display.description: Plain text narrative that identifies the resource in addition to the resource reference.

identifier.description: Logical reference, when literal reference is not known

reference.description: Literal reference, Relative, internal or absolute URL

implicitRules.description: A set of rules under which this content was created

language.description: The base language in which the resource is written.

url.description: Source of the definition for the extension code - a logical name or a URL.

contentType.description: Mime type of the content, with charset etc.

creation.description: The date that the attachment was first created.

data.description: The actual data of the attachment - a sequence of bytes, base64 encoded.

hash.description: The calculated hash of the data using SHA-1. Represented using base64.

language.description: The human language of the content. The value can be any valid value according to BCP 47.

size.description: The number of bytes of data that make up this attachment (before base64 encoding, if that is done).

title.description: A label or set of text to display in place of the data.

url.description: A location where the data can be accessed.

coding.description: A reference to a code defined by a terminology system.

text.description: Plain text representation of the concept

period.description: Time period during which identifier is/was valid for use.

system.description: The namespace for the identifier value

lastUpdated.description: When the resource last changed - e.g. when the version changed.

profile.description: Profiles this resource claims to conform to

security.description: Security Labels applied to this resource

source.description: Identifies where the resource comes from

end.description: End time with inclusive boundary, if not ongoing

start.description: The start of the period. The boundary is inclusive.

div.description: The actual narrative content, a stripped down version of XHTML.

code.description: Symbol in syntax defined by the system

display.description: A representation of the meaning of the code in the system, following the rules of the system.

system.description: The identification of the code system that defines the meaning of the symbol in the code.

userSelected.description: If this coding was chosen directly by the user

version.description: Version of the system - if relevant

city.description: The name of the city, town, suburb, village or other community or delivery center.

country.description: Country - a nation as commonly understood or generally accepted.

district.description: The name of the administrative area (county).

line.description: Street name, number, direction & P.O. Box etc.

period.description: Time period when address was/is in use.

postalCode.description: A postal code designating a region defined by the postal service.

code.description: A computer processable form of the unit in some unit representation system.

system.description: The identification of the system that provides the coded form of the unit.

unit.description: A human-readable form of the unit.
